oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crystal Shrine Grotto in Memorial Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crystal Shrine Grotto in Memorial Park, color image.

–“Memorial Park Cemetery Funeral Home -- The Crystal Shrine Grotto (exterior view) was built in the 1930’s by E. C. Hinds and Mexican sculptor Dionicio Rodriguez. This grotto is a manmade cave of crystal rock containing scenes from the life of Christ. Open to visitors daily. Memorial Park, Memphis, TN. 5669 Poplar Avenue Memphis, TN 38119 -- (901) 767-8930 -- Funeral Home · Cemetery · Mausoleum · Crematory · Flower Shop”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crystal Shrine Grotto; Memorial Park; parks; memorials; shrines; cemeteries; funerals;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: MWM Dexter – Aurora, Missouri; Collection processed by Angela Price
